answers.answer: I had one at 8 weeks one at 12 weeks and at one at 17 weeks
with this pregnancy I'vehad like 6 ultrasounds I've seen my BAby alot  plus i paid for a 4 d ultrasound too so that's alot im so happy i get to see my Baby alot:))
So far I've had one at twelve weeks. I have one this week and I'm eighteen weeks.
I am 32 weeks now and I only had one. Should I ask for another?
Im 36 weeks and had have 2 so far... one at 10weeks... one at 20weeks and im having another one in about a week to check the size of baby.
Oooh i think i had almost 20. I was constantly worried :( for no reason
I've had 4 different ultrasounds. The baby's heartbeat was 175 + high risk so i have to get an ultrasound twice a week up until my c section.
I had 1 at 12w 1 at 20w and 1 at 33w because they were worried about my babies growth
My first and secind I only got 1, my third I got one every other month. With this one I get one every month because I'm high risk. I have over 50 pics of this like guy so far and im 30W. Love it!

I got one when I found out I was pregnant , which was at 7.3 weeks , one at 13weeks & one at 21weeks.  And then when I was 29weeks I started getting them every week because I have gestational diabetes & I'm 37 weeks 3days .
I'm 28 weeks & going for my 5th Thursday.I go once a month.

3 so far. The dr tried to scare us into more by saying her pappa was low and they could \only\ check her growth rate with Ultrasounds every 3 weeks.LIESUltrasounds are big $$ for hospitals and insurance covers them. But sound waves heat up your womb and babies don't like them. Ours kicked up a storm at 16weeks!There is also(abet weak) ultrasounds are not good for baby; genetic issues, over heating, ect.When we told the doc NO she backed right off and changed her tune on how low pappa was only weakly coralated to low birth weight. If its too easy to get them to change thier mind you have to wonder

question: How many ultrasounds did you have during your pregnancy? So far I've only had one at my 4 months.
title: Ultrasound
